message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $150. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you think?
Alice, $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $110 right now. What do you think?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, $150 is already a fair price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $130?
Alice, I understand your position, but $130 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $115. If you're not willing to come down further, I'll have to consider my other options.
